## Results

```{r}
#| label: tbl-interviews
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| tbl-cap: "This is a table."
interviews_plotting %>% 
  filter(!is.na(memb_assoc)) %>% 
  group_by(village, memb_assoc) %>% 
  summarise(mean_no_members = mean(no_membrs)) %>% 
  knitr::kable(col.names = c("Village", "Member", "Mean members"))
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-myplot

percent_wall_type %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = respondent_wall_type, 
             y = percent)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
    labs(x = "Village",
         y = "Percent",
         title = "Proportion of wall type by village",
         fill = "Type of wall in home") +
    facet_wrap(~ village) +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.major.y = element_line(colour = "blue"))
```
